QuestData.Title: Bad Genes
QuestData.Description: Far to the south, Wakener, the Empress's genemancers set about their dark experiments. (Dark yes, but not as dark as mine!)$B$BThey dissect and mutate the nearby wildlife, breeding creatures of their own design. (Their design, which will become my design!)$B$BWe must not let them succeed! (No, no! Only I am allowed such power!)$B$BTheir mutations are already being unleashed for war. Go! Destroy them at any cost!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 3 Ik'thik Genemancers and 6 Ik'thik Egg-Drones.
